# Morph

Use `morph/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "morph-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "morph/auto",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `MORPH_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/openai-compatible`

This provider uses the OpenAI-compatible adapter.

## Default base URL

`https://api.morphllm.com/v1`

You can override the base URL by setting `MORPH_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://docs.morphllm.com/api-reference/introduction

## Models

<details>
  <summary>Show models (3)</summary>

- auto
- morph-v3-fast
- morph-v3-large

</details>
